statements: DELETE FROM instruments WHERE name = 'Guitar' AND type = 'Acoustic'
DELETE FROM instruments WHERE type = 'Electric' AND brand = 'Fender'
DELETE FROM instruments WHERE id = 1 AND brand = 'Brand A';
DELETE FROM instrument_inventory WHERE price > 1000 AND brand_id = (SELECT id FROM brands WHERE brand_name = 'Fender');
DELETE FROM instrument_inventory WHERE category_id = (SELECT id FROM instrument_categories WHERE category_name = 'String Instruments') AND year < 2000;
